goal.ch:
修完本課程，學生應能
1. 運用基本英語會話技巧；
2. 理解日常生活中對話內容，並能清楚地表達自己的意見；
3. 從較難的對話內容猜想並推論大意，作筆記，並作出適當的回應；
4. 具備簡報大綱的編輯製作能力。
goal.en:
On successful completion of this course, students will be able to
1. greet people, make small talks, open/close a conversation, and ask for clarification;
2. understand and respond to daily conversations in coherent manner.
3. and guess the meaning of unfamiliar language items, listen for the gist, take notes and give appropriate responses.
4. create presentation outlines.“

outline.ch:
Unit 1 The way we are
Adjectives vs. manner adverbs
Talk about people’s behavior, personality traits, and habits
Unit 2 Experiences
Present perfect and simple past tenses
Talk about experiences and secret dreams
Show interest to keep a conversation going
Unit 3 Wonders of the world
Superlative adjectives
Talk about the best, worst, and the most beautiful things
Describe nature features
Unit 4 Family life
Verbs let, make, help, have, get, want, ask, and tell
Talk about your immediate family
Describe memories using used to and would
Unit 5 Food choices
Countable and uncountable nouns
Talk about eating habits, different ways to cook food
Unit 6 Managing life
Future tense, and give suggestions or advice
Talk about future plans and schedules
Ask for and give advice about personal situations

gradMethod.ch:
1. 期中評量：25％
2. 期末統一考試：25％
3. 英語自學相關評量：5％
4. 小考+報告: 10％
5. 出席+參與度+小組討論 35％
gradMethod.en:
Students who take this course need to be aware that it is mandatory to attend most sessions. The scores will be evaluated upon the following criteria: 
1. Mid-term Exam 25％
2. Final Exam: listening comprehension 25％ 
3. Self-Paced English Learning Center(passport) 5％
4. Quizzes 10％ 
5. Attendance ＆ Participation ＆ Group Discussion 35％
